Subinterfaces of BranchRates in dr.evomodel.branchratemodel
 interface BranchRateModel
          Date: Dec 13, 2004 Time: 1:59:24 PM
 

Classes in dr.evomodel.branchratemodel that implement BranchRates
 class AbstractBranchRateModel
          An abstract base class for BranchRateModels to help implement some of the interfaces
 class ArbitraryBranchRates
          Allows branch rates to take on any double value This is useful for forming a scaled mixture of normals for the continuous diffusion model
 class AttributeBranchRateModel
           
 class CompoundBranchRateModel
          Takes a collection of BranchRateModels and returns the product of the respective rates.
 class ContinuousBranchRates
          Uses the implementation of continuous branch rates described in: Li, W.L.S.
 class ContinuousEpochBranchRateModel
           
 class ContinuousTraitBranchRateModel
          Takes the log rates at each node provided by a specified rate and give the branch rate as the average.
 class DecayingRateModel
           
 class DefaultBranchRateModel
           
 class DiscreteTraitBranchRateModel
          This Branch Rate Model takes a ancestral state likelihood and gives the rate for each branch of the tree based on the ancestor state and child state or based on the Markov Rewards (i.e., time spent in each state).
 class DiscretizedBranchRates
           
 class LocalClockModel
           
 class MixtureModelBranchRates
           
 class PassageBranchRateModel
           
 class RandomLocalClockModel
          A model of rates evolving along a tree, such that at each node the rate may change or not depending on an indicator which chooses whether the parent rate is inherited or a new rate begins on the branch above the node.
 class RateEpochBranchRateModel
          Implements a model where time is broken into 'epochs' each with a different but constant rate.
 class ScaledTreeLengthRateModel
          Package: ScaledTreeLengthRateModel Description:

Created by Alexander V.
 class StrictClockBranchRates

Uses of BranchRates in dr.evomodel.clock
 

Classes in dr.evomodel.clock that implement BranchRates
 class ACLikelihood
          Calculates the likelihood of a set of rate changes in a tree, assuming a (log)normal or inverse gaussian distributed change in rate at each node, with a mean of the previous (log) rate and a variance proportional to branch length.
 class RateEvolutionLikelihood
          Abstract superclass of likelihoods of rate evolution through time.
 class UCLikelihood
          Calculates the likelihood of a set of rate changes in a tree, assuming that rates are lognormally distributed cf Yang and Rannala 2006
 class UniversalClock
          A class that calculates the rate of evolution based on of the mass and temperature
